p:
The biocompatibilities of MO1, MO5 and MO9 were investigated using an MTT (3–(4,5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl)-2,5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide) assay and normal VERO cells
37 ,
38 . Results showed that MO1, MO5 and MO9 were non-toxic to normal VERO cells with IC 50 values of 195.14, 185.44 and 188.34 µg/mL, respectively, indicating that the therapeutic potentials of these compounds would be suitable.
